entry.title: Friday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early this morning. A few rain showers beginning this morning then changing to a few flurries this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
